title: Halloween ghost cupcakes
ingredients: ['140g plain flour', '45g cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '200g caster sugar', '115g butter', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '235ml milk', 'For decorating', '400g to 450g vanilla buttercream-style icing', '6 large marshmallows, cut in half crosswise', '2 tablespoons icing sugar', '225g ready-to-use white fondant', '12 raisins, halved']
